verses.name: Daniel 5:21
verses.text: And he was driven from the sons of men; and his heart was made like the beasts, and his dwelling was with the wild asses: they fed him with grass like oxen, and his body was wet with the dew of heaven; till he knew that the most high God ruled in the kingdom of men, and that he appointeth over it whomsoever he will.

verses.name: Daniel 5:22
verses.text: And thou his son, O Belshazzar, hast not humbled thine heart, though thou knewest all this;
